textBox.richText: I have now finished the first round of bibliographies for this site - there are more than 50 lists of books to start researching various world history and genocide topics here! The Atlantic revolutions book list I’ve put together focuses on comparing events in the Americas, including Haiti and the United States. Bibliography of Comparative Atlantic Revolutions Bibliographies of the Atlantic Revolutions (links to all the bibliographies connected to the Atlantic Revolutions) Books (place to find all the bibliographies) Site Guide (place to find all the pages on the site) Search (place to search for what you want - note that it takes google a few weeks to index all the information when I add pages to the site)
Comparative Studies of the Atlantic Revolutions
